评论详情: they are thin socks and not what I expected but I love them. they remind me of compression socks but they are easy to get on and off. they are a little past my knees.

类型: Special Size Type: StandardSize: One SizeColor: Black
评论详情: Being thin, they're very stretchy, which is perfect as they can fit over my somewhat large feet. However, this does mean they end up being somewhat transparent. This is a plus or a minus, depending on what you're after. Still, for the price, I like them. They're very comfortable.

类型: Special Size Type: StandardSize: One SizeColor: Coffee,black,light Gray
评论详情: I used the black socks for a Britney Spears costume and they were perfect! They even fit well over my larger calves. I will look forward to wearing the others too. Would definitely recommend!

类型: Special Size Type: StandardSize: One SizeColor: White
评论详情: The fabric blend is stretchy, lightweight, and soft. They feel well constructed, and I think this 3 pack is an AMAZING VALUE!  My daughter especially loves that these socks aren't heavy, and she finds them very comfortable to wear.

评论概述: Fit was tight to begin with and they shrank in the wash even on gentle cycle.
类型: Special Size Type: StandardSize: One SizeColor: White,black,green
评论详情: I do not recommend these socks for anyone to purchase. The fit is too small straight out of the package to begin with, and, when you wash them, even on the gentle cycle and line dried, they are going to shrink even more somehow. Just a low-quality made product that was very disappointing.

类型: Special Size Type: StandardSize: One SizeColor: Red, Yellow, Dark Gray
评论详情: My 11 year old loves these socks as they wear a lot of long socks with their outfits. They are good quality fabric and a decent thickness. The colors are vibrant and they come up right under the knees.
